com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.Creatable
      • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.Texture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLVersioned
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GL20Texture

    public abstract class Texture
extends Creatable
implements GLVersioned
    Represents a texture for OpenGL. Image data and various parameters can be set after creation. Image data should be set last.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Texture.CompareMode 
      static class  Texture.FilterMode
      An enum for the texture filtering modes.
      static class  Texture.Format
      An enum of texture component formats.
      static class  Texture.InternalFormat
      An enum of sized texture component formats.
      static class  Texture.WrapMode
      An enum for the texture wrapping modes.

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from class: Creatable

      • bind

        public abstract void bind(int unit)
        Binds the texture to the OpenGL context.
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit to bind the texture to, or -1 to just bind the texture

      • setAnisotropicFiltering

        public abstract void setAnisotropicFiltering(float value)
        Sets the value for anisotropic filtering. Must be greater than zero. Note that this is EXT based and might not be supported on all hardware.
        Parameters:
        value - The anisotropic filtering value

      • setWraps

        public abstract void setWraps(Texture.WrapMode horizontalWrap,
                              Texture.WrapMode verticalWrap)
        Sets the horizontal and vertical texture wraps.
        Parameters:
        horizontalWrap - The horizontal wrap
        verticalWrap - The vertical wrap

      • setFilters

        public abstract void setFilters(Texture.FilterMode minFilter,
                                Texture.FilterMode magFilter)
        Sets the texture's min and mag filters. The mag filter cannot require mipmap generation.
        Parameters:
        minFilter - The min filter
        magFilter - The mag filter

      • setCompareMode
